headline: Southern Company (SO): Assessing Valuation Following Illinois Regulatory Ruling on Nicor Rate Increase
summary: Southern (SO) is navigating some fresh regulatory terrain after its subsidiary Nicor received partial approval for a rate hike from the Illinois Commerce Commission. The commission granted 53% of the requested increase. This decision has direct implications for Southern’s expected earnings. See our latest analysis for Southern. This regulatory news comes as Southern’s share price has been under a bit of pressure recently, with a 7% decline over the past month and a 4.4% dip over the last...

headline: VST vs. SO: Which Utility Stock Looks More Attractive for Now?
summary: VST's rising earnings outlook, strong ROE and faster sales growth sharpen its edge in a head-to-head comparison with SO.
